title: 46: No Such Thing As An Apostle Called Scrotum
content: Dan (@schreiberland), James (@jamesharkin), Andy (@andrewhunterm) and Anna (@nosuchthing) discuss bad Harry Potter translations, how to spot a Lama and ancient practical jokes.
contentSnippet: Dan (@schreiberland), James (@jamesharkin), Andy (@andrewhunterm) and Anna (@nosuchthing) discuss bad Harry Potter translations, how to spot a Lama and ancient practical jokes.
